content.rendered:
Recieving/Distribution Clerk | Tulsa, Oklahoma
  • Full time
  • Receiving all products delivered to Materials Management and delivers to each department
  • Receiving Stat orders
  • Organizing computer system / warehouse
  • Serves as back up to Materials Manager
  • Must have knowledge of medical supplies
  • Computer proficient  – Excel knowledge a must
  • $11-$12.50/hour
